message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob. Your turn!
You're starting strong, but I'm not going to let you take the whole pie!
You took a big bite last round, but I'm still hungry! Will you share some more?
I'm not backing down, but I'll give you a bit more this time. Don't get too comfortable!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll take a slightly bigger share this time. Your turn, Bob!
You're running out of time, Alice! I'm taking a firmer stance now.
I'm not giving up yet! I'll try to find a compromise. Can we meet in the middle?
